Blog.post: I miss rainbows and I miss movies. I miss "Mexico" and I miss those great hugs. (the ones I wished would never end) And I miss a whole hell of a lot... like being able to be "me" around someone and knowing that they were being "them" around me. I miss where it was going. (or maybe that was an illusion of where I thought it was going). I miss smiling and seeing a smile in return... knowing that I made it appear. I miss a certain baboon. I miss a whole hell of a lot... but mostly I just miss you.

I think I went into blogger withdrawal while I was gone this weekend... despite the fact that I had so much fun being with such an amazing friend. I'll apologize for the rambling entries. Sometimes I'm fairly positive that the only thing that keeps me going is my ability to purge onto paper (or computer screen) all the things going through my mind. Last weekend I discovered my favorite place. Before then I thought for sure it was curled up in my bed writing. Or perhaps sitting on a horse soaring over jumps. I was wrong all that time. I realized my favorite place was curled up, safe and sound next to someone who cares. More specifically you. I suppose that doesn't matter much, that my favorite place is there. In all likelyhood the "you" I'm referring to isn't even reading. I guess that's alright. At least I can admit it to myself. I'd give just about anything to have my favorite place be riding a horse or writing in my bed right about now, because at least I could go there and feel safe and good and happy. But my favorite place... well let's just say I need to come up with a new favorite place. The one I have has some conflicts of interest... and quite frankly has pretty much banished me. I suppose that's my fault. For opening my mouth and saying something. So many things have been my fault lately. There's no Mexico; that's my fault. Maybe I'm more upset about that than I'm letting myself admit or believe. Most likely. It's really, really hard to sit here missing something and someone this way. And to know it doesn't matter. Especially when you started out with the belief that it did and you did. Part of me thinks I should say I'm sorry. And then the other part of me says that I should just continue to bite my tongue because I did nothing wrong, other than stand up for myself and demand the respect I know I deserve. *sigh* Two different problems. Perhaps they're not so different. And perhaps I should just fade into oblivion. I know at least two people who seem to want that very much.

Rather good logic. Stolen from JW. "Another women's issue, prostitution. I do not understand why prostitution is illegal. Why should prostitution be illegal. Selling is legal. Fucking is legal. Why isn't selling fucking legal? You know, why should it be illegal to sell something that's perfectly legal to give away. I can't follow the logic on that at all. Of all the things you can do to a person, giving someone an orgasm is hardly the worst thing in the world. In the army they give you a medal for spraying napalm on people. Civilian life, you go to jail for giving someone an orgasm. Maybe I'm not supposed to understand it." -George Carlin I like it. Sound logic. Indeed.
I'm sorry. I'm just hurt. And confused. And angry. And it's so much easier to let myself be angry Than to let myself feel hurt.

I can see how much I meant. How much all my promises meant. How much all the promises made to me meant. NOTHING. Eye-opening really. I guess I should thank the friend who brought something to my attention that I needed to know about. And I guess I should thank myself for being able to say that that wasn't acceptable. I'm in the market for a nice guy who doesn't lie or cheat. I'm a very nice girl. Perhaps I too should post something on match.com. Seems like the popular thing to do these days....

This weekend was what I'd call wonderful. Three whole days of not sitting around thinking constantly about everything that's upsetting me. And I got to see someone I haven't seen in a long time... too long. Actually, I got to see two someone's I hadn't seen in a long time. I missed them both VERY much. I need more weekends like this one. I need more times when I can just be with people that make me smile like this weekend. I need more times when I can just curl up and feel happy and cozy and safe. And I definitely need more times when I get hugged so much that I forget about all the crap going on in my head and in my life. Thank you Steve. (and Drake, thank you too...) I would love to wake up in the morning and have everything be "ok". I just want more good. I can't take any more bad.
What a day. Evil snow. Hooray for me and the car for making it home without getting killed.

PS- Oil is checked. Yay me. Daddy thought I would forget or wouldn't know how... or something. It's fine, though. ...although perhaps I shouldn't be referring to "daddy" anymore. I should figure that out... Old habbits die hard. Especially when they were like air to you.

I'm not at all sure what the hell I did wrong. Everything that was asked of me, I did. One major thing, that was thrown in my face after the fact... as something unwanted. Unwanted. When it's all that's been talked about. I asked about something that I had every right to ask about... And it's been ignored. Always a clue that my instinct was right. *shrug* What was wanted was had. Someday that realization will hit. All those promises... I made them. They were made to me. Of course, maybe it was never what was wanted. I mean, I know what I wanted. I said what I wanted. I promised what I wanted. I just have to believe that it wasn't mutual. Otherwise absolutely none of this makes sense. OK. Fine. Good girls can always find someone who wants what they do. I thought I had. I thought it was real. Silence is loud though. And tells me that... what I saw was what I thought. And that what I believed (that I was "that" someone) (that I was "the one and only) doesn't even come close to the truth. It'd be a different thing if this had been refuted... if I mattered enough for some kind of rebuttle. I don't though, or haven't so far. I know that I wanted what I promised. It didn't matter if it was now or if I had to wait two or three or ten more years. It was worth it. You were. And every word out of my mouth was sincere and honest and true. Every promise. Every single one. Do you have any clue what is going to disappear? Do you even care?

oh, and a quick note... my senior capstone is done. *GRIN* one less thing to worry about i guess. good thing too. i have enough. *and a disclamer... if you don't want to know what i'm thinking/feeling then don't come here and read it, especially if you're just going to get angry or offended. that's not what i'm writing for. i'm writing for me. so my head doesn't explode. that could be rather messy... and since i left "my" gun in buffalo (feel free to ask, i'll show you a picture of "my" gun) i need a way to blow off some steam.

There are a lot of things I simply do not understand. I don't understand how you can say one thing to someone, all the while knowing that it's a lie. I don't understand how you can have exactly what it is you say you want, and still not be satisfied. I don't know how you can look someone in the eye and say these things and know that you're either saying them to someone else or that you don't mean them. It's funny to me... in an ironic sort of way. How I look at what's going on in my life and part of me just wants it to be fixed. I just want it to go back to a time when I had no reason to doubt anything or question anything. But I know that's impossible. I have a reason to question things. I have a reason to be wary. Good reasons. I have a reason to be wary of everything... especially right now. After this wonderful time full of words that I fully believed meant something. They didn't. I come home and I find out they didn't mean anything... and I had to be terrified that I'd be sitting here alone dealing with consequences of everything that happened. "Luckily" that's not the case... or at least it's 99% sure it's not the case... I guess anything is possible right? I want what I've been promising. And I want what I've promised. I'm left with this awful feeling that I'm not going to get that... for whatever reason. It all seems so empty. Hollow words. I want to be something important. I'm not. I want to be "that" someone. I want to be "the one". And only. I don't think I am. And that hasn't been refuted. *shrug* I'm back at square one. Again. "This doubt is screaming in my face in this familiar place sheltered and concealed And if this night won't let me rest Don't let me second guess what I know to be real Put away all I know for tonight And maybe I just might learn to let it go Take away my security from me And maybe finally I won't have to know everything I am falling into grace To the unknown to where you are..." -Lifehouse

I think perhaps this will be addicting :) *I'm on an obsessive lifehouse kick. Last night I just sat here and listened to this CD and cried. Because that's what I needed to do... just let myself cry. I hadn't cried since before my grandmother died. A lot has happened since then, I've lost a lot... and last night I finally let myself deal with it. "There goes the world off of my shoulders There goes the world off of my back There it goes." -Lifehouse *I'm also an obsessive lyric sharer, especially when they touch me so deeply or comfort me so deeply. "I tried to climb your steps I tried to chase you down I tried to see how low I could get down to the ground I tried to earn my way I tried to change this mind You better believe I tried to beat this When will this end It goes on and on Over and over and over again Keep spinning around I know it won't stop 'til I step down from this for good." -Lifehouse "I can't be losin sleep over this no I can't And I cannot stop pacing Give me a few hours and I'll have this all sorted out If my mind would just stop racing I cannot stand still I can't be this unsturdy This cannot be happening This is over my head But underneath my feet Because by tomorrow I'll have this thing beat And everything will be back to the way that it was I wish that it was just that easy I am waiting for tonight Then waiting for tomorrow And I am somewhere in between What is real and just a dream Would you catch me if I fall out of what I fell in? Don't be surprised if I collapse down at your feet again I don't want to run away from this I know that I just don't need this. Because I cannot stand still I can't be this unsturdy This cannot be happening I am waiting for tonight Then waiting for tomorrow And I am somewhere in between What is real and just a dream." - Lifehouse 'Somewhere in Between *And I don't think words have ever been quite so true. Those words. All of them. There are other words too... very appropriate words. I just don't know...
My senior capstone is almost finished. I'm currently working on the conclusion... and it's very relieving. A lot on my mind currently. Far too much actually. Thanks JW. *kiss*
its youurs password 1234 user name lolabpstar
"I don't want you to go..." OK. So why do you want me to stay?
"Go on and take it take another little piece of my heart now baby..." -Janis Joplin

How would you feel if I told you I was going back to him? How would you feel if I told you there was anyone else for that matter? Would it hurt you? Don't lie, I know it would. I just want to hear you admit it... I know it's true. But I need to hear it. Maybe then this wouldn't hurt so god damn much.

So help me understand... why I get an email from you when you're visiting a potential job site. why i get an email that tells me how sorry you are for not responding sooner. why i get an email telling me that you'll "talk to me when you're back." Help me understand... why you completely ignored me tonight. why you acted like I didn't exist. why you only looked at me when you thought I wasn't looking. Help me understand... why you hurt me like that. why you almost made me cry. why you acted oblivious to my pain. Because I don't understand.
Today has been the kind of day where I ended up sitting here simply wishing for someone to show up at my door and wrap their arms around me and hold me until it all goes away. I'd beg if I had to.

You wanted to talk to me? That "nice job tonight" and light touch on the back of my neck was suppose to convey that? I'm sorry... I didn't understand. I wish you'd be more clear. I would've talked forever...

Compromise by Edie Carey your love is sweet and soft just look how you use those eyes and the way you compromised your love is sweet and strong it pulls me in with the tide and up is down and down is wrong go or stay / stay or go just be a poet about it fall down on your knees be a poet if that's what you claim to be be a poet outside of your sad poetry your love is neither hot nor cold it's that you can't quite name it that makes me feel old your love comes apart when it hits the light go or stay / stay or go just be a poet about it fall down on your knees be a poet if that's what you claim to be be a poet outside of your sad poetry be a poet about it yeah - work up a sweat do everything you have not done yet be a poet outside of your sad poetry your love is sweet and it's soft i'd kill to believe those eyes just look how i compromised
"I need you just a little just a little Alright? Are you satisfied?" -Edie Carey

I use to recognize the girl staring back at me when I looked in the mirror. Now a stranger looks back at me, taunting me. She looks so familiar so close to this girl I once knew... She looks out at me a glint in her eye a smirk on her face telling me, unmistakably, "I" don't exist. This familiar stranger has taken over... overthrown me. Soon I'll recognize the stranger, though and "I" will be lost somewhere inside.
Let me just say, I do not appreciate being called a liar. Because I haven't lied about one god damn thing.

I shall pose a question (and the person it's posed to know's who they are... because I told them) So on to the question... What the hell am I suppose to do? Is this some kind of a game to you? Am I going to be ignored unless I'm avoiding the entire situation completely? Are you going to continuously ignore the fact that there's something and that you're just too damn afraid to do something about it? Or if there isn't something (which is bull, and you know it as well as I do)... if there isn't something are you just going to ignore the fact that I'm sitting here dying because you keep jerking me around simply because it's easier than simply saying, "Well, I meant it when I said pay back's a bitch." I mean... seriously. I have no clue where I stand... because I keep getting all these different messages. One minute it's one thing, the next minute it's another thing. I'd rather have "pay back's a bitch" consistently than to have that one minute and "I miss" another minute. How the hell does that work anyway? I can't do this anymore. Every night I sit here and I wish that I'd wake up tomorrow and it'd be different... or that I won't wake up at all. I can't pretend that I'm OK being "buddy". I said way back at the beginning, when Rainbows and what was "right" for you (and me) came into all of it that I would never be able to go back to being your buddy. I guess my main question is do you even care? Really. Do you care one little iota at all? Am I worth anything. Because you're making me feel worthless. Did you know that? You really are. I feel like I am because the only time we talk is when no one is around that could "tell" on you. Do you care at all what that makes me feel like? I want to know. "I miss..." You say you do too... but then you ignore me when I ask. My room is in the same place. The number is still the same. Am I not worth a conversation. I know that I'm not worthy of much else, apparently... but... Do you care at all? Because I'm dying... and it looks like you're A-OK. Despite what you tell everyone other than me.

I wonder how many times I would have to say or type the words I'm sorry for this to be fixed? Probably until my fingers fell off... and I'd be typing with my toes... Until my toes fell off. And then I'd be typing... pecking the letters with my nose. I'd do it... all of that, if I thought that it would repent for a stupid friend's stupid actions. I'll start now... I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry... I'm sorry I'd type that forever... I really would... :(

Today is Easter... one of my favorite holiday's despite the very blatant religious theme. I've never been sure why that is... why I like it so much that is. Maybe because my birthday sometimes falls on Easter, or it's usually really close to it. Today, though, is one of those bittersweet days. I'm glad it's Easter and that I'm home. But I'm upset about a lot of other things. Things that I'm sorry for, despite the fact that I didn't do them. Things I wish I could fix, but know I can't. *sigh* Happy Easter I guess.

Too bad a concussion doesn't automatically mean you forget things. There are a few things I'd kill to forget. Stupid friends who've ruined a friendship or any chance of one. Mexico. Rainbows. *sigh* So many things associated with Mexico and Rainbows. It's all still there though, right in the front of my memory. Even if my head is bruised, it's still all right there. I wish it would all just go away....
I wish you would just butt out .

There aren't enough ways to apologize for my friend overstepping every boundry there is. There simply aren't enough words or ways to say "sorry." I am though. Sorry that is. Now I know that he'll never speak to me again... never. I deserve it for having a friend that would be so stupid. I understand that she was trying to help... in her own way, but it wasn't helpful. At all. I wish with everything in me that she had minded her own business. I wish that there was a way for him to believe I didn't know about this until it happened... and that I never would have condoned it had I known. I'm MORTIFIED by this whole thing, and I feel horrible. I was trying so hard to be a friend... it mattered so much to me to be a good friend. Because I care so much. And now that's all ruined. Because of one stupid act by my "friend". This can't be fixed. Because of one friend... I'm losing another. I'm Sorry .

What am I suppose to make of the two cards I got today? How am I suppose to not be confused... when I get that in my inbox? How? I'd love to know... Not that they didn't make me smile in some dark place that I can't admit for fear of losing my sanity. But mostly they just confused... and I want to know how I'm suppose to not be confused. How? If I knew how, then It'd be better. Then it wouldn't hurt so much. *read song below...*
"Take me, touch me, Hold me like you mean it Make me come alive Hurt me, Heal me Come and make me feel it Rescue me tonight Love me back to life..." -Bon Jovi

I got the job. I got into the grad school. I just wish I could be happy... Perhaps if I was moving to a place where I knew someone... other than someone who doesn't really want to talk to me anymore... (or perhaps that's just my perception... I don't know). I know that this is a good opportunity. I know this is going to be an amazing experience And that my master's degree is going to be completely paid off. I'm just afraid to be alone out there. It sounds childish. But it's how I feel.
And thank you Jordan, for fixing my links. It's so much more aesthetically pleasing now.

Tomorrow is my birthday. And I wish a lot of things were different. I wish that things were better for someone I care about... probably more than I should at this point. I wish I was some help to him... Rather than feeling like I'm just bothersome. Rather than feeling like I'm a source of misery. I've tried so hard not to be that. So hard. I've avoided everything that I'm feeling... all these horrible feelings that stem from things before last Friday and because of Friday. Instead of talking about that I've tried so hard to be supportive and a good friend. It's important to me that I am... and I just feel like I'm failing. I hate that feeling. I wish that I didn't feel so alone in all of this. I just wish that so many things were different. I wish I had been a better friend when I got a phone call at 2:30 in the morning... I wish that I fully understood why that call happened in the first place since it seems like talking to me is some form of punishment. Although at the same time I know that's not true. Or at least I'd like to believe that it's not true. I'd like to believe that it's not me... that it's just stuff he has to deal with. I care so much. And maybe I shouldn't, but I do. I care on a lot of different levels, but mostly just the level where he's someone who's meant quite a lot to me for a really long time (almost three years total). I don't want to lose someone who's had such a dramatic impact on my life. I don't want to just fade into oblivion because I value him... and not just as someone I dated. It's not about that. It's about so much more than that. Maybe I shouldn't be writing this... I suppose I should be happy and upbeat and excited that tomorrow's my birthday. I'm not though. This "I'm OK" mask is slowly slipping away. I'm upset about things I haven't dealt with yet... so many things. I'm scared that I'm going to lose this person's friendship... terrified really. Because he matters so much. Whether that means anything to him or not is a completely different story. I just wish everything was different... and if not "everything" than at least some things. Perhaps when I blow out the imaginary candles on the imaginary cake tomorrow, I'll get my wish...
I feel as if I'm the butt of some cosmic joke.
yay! all fixed!
big links are fixed?

Have you ever found yourself somewhere in your life and you really have absolutely no idea how you got there? I look around and I don't know how I got here. I don't understand what the hell I did wrong. I don't understand what I did to deserve this. I just don't understand. It's just... blah. I'm totally overwhelmed and I feel as if I'm totally lost in everything. I don't know if I want to be found anymore.

Today has been a really good day. Really good. I found out I got hired at the job I recently interviewed for. Now I just have to get into their Grad school and I'll be all set. And I got to see a certain someone without simply watching them walk past me... which made me happier than I can possibly describe. *smile*

Have you ever... missed someone so much it feels like you can't breathe? Have you ever... cared so much about someone that it feels like your heart is breaking? (i have i have i have) Have you ever... wanted something so bad it hurt? Have you ever... cried so hard, so much there were no tears anymore? (i have i have i have) I miss you like that. I care about you like that. I want this like that. I cry like that. (i do i do i do)
i want to fit into a pretty little package with ribbons....

Another thing I realized today? Sitting and reading some of the most amazing poetry I've ever read (my friend is really talented... stunningly so) That it's been FAR too long since I've written Anything worthwhile.

Today I sat talking to a friend I hadn't spoken to in far too long... (and the reasons for the not speaking part don't really matter... most of them were stupid or unintentional) But today I sat talking to her... And I realized how much I had missed just doing that and having someone other than my journal and my two other good friends here to talk to about things.

Fly by Poe It makes sense that it should happen this way That the sky should break, and the earth should shake as if to say: sure it all matters but in such an unimportant way as if to say: fly away sweet bird of prey fly fly away nothing can stand in your way sweet bird if you knew the words I know you would say: fly away It makes sense that it should HURT in this way That my heart should break and my hands should shake- as if to say: sure it don't matter except in the most important way As if to say: Fly away sweet bird of prey fly fly away nothing can stand in your way sweet bird if you knew the words I know you'd say: Fly away It makes sense that it should feel just this way That you slowly fade and yet still remain- as if to say Everythign matters in such an INVISIBLE way as if to say- Fly Away. It's OK

Not sure if this will work... but if you want to see me and my spirited support of the Syracuse Orangemen, go to the link below (hopefully there's a link below!) It's me in my boss's huge sweatshirt! urlLink GO 'CUSE
'CUSE WON!!!!!!!!!!! Syracuse that is. And the final four is what they won! YAYYAYYAYYAYYAY!!! Definitely a damn good game. And definitely helped me get my mind off of stuff. GO 'CUSE!!!
So... I'm scared. And sad. And... a lot of things. Mostly sad and scared.
"I don't want you to hate me." There's another thing that should've been thought of BEFORE all of this. *sigh* my birthday is in 6 days. And I'm losing everything.

This weekend was really great. Really, really great. I almost bought a stuffed donkey named 'Fiesta'. My birthday present to myself because it reminded me of 'Mexico'... and other things. I resisted the temptation. And 'Cuse won!!!! And a lot of really nice things happened. Very nice things. Feel free to ask me about them.... *smile* By the way: Did you know I have a "hot cha-cha-cha"? *feel free to ask about that one too!
I had this dream last night... or maybe it was this morning. An amazing dream. All about "mexico" And wishes. And missing no more. I hate having to wake up from dreams like that.

I have been told I look "cute" far too many times today. Huge sweatshirt makin' me look rather little *grin* All I need now is a set of pigtails! GO CUSE! I'm off for the weekend. If I wanted you to know where I'll I would have told you already.

Tomorrow is 'Cuse Day' Since Syracuse is going to the big east final four. *YAY CUSE* I wanted to be spirted, so I asked Ryan to borrow a shirt. He lent me his sweatshirt. LOL I can no longer find my hands. HAHAHAHA I'm *swimming* in this damn thing. GO CUSE
12 Days until my birthday.... Wonder if I'll get what I want? I wish, I wish... I think you know what I wish.

So the words "pathetic" "emotionally stunted" "incapable of commitment" "deeply disappointing" and "Exactly like Lauren" come to mind. I'm done wasting my time with someone who's far too old to be this young.

A note from Cheer Bear: OK, I've been hanging in the damn closet long enough. It's about time you both simmer down And just stop being ridiculous. Damnit. *A note from me? I wish I wish... I think you know what I wish.
"V: so how are things beside you missing an old friend?" "Me: i miss more than an old friend." "V: Alright. You miss him completely." That's the understatement of the decade.

13 days until my birthday. I wonder if I'll get what I want? And if you don't know what it is I want... then obviously I don't want anything from you. Well... nothing you're going to actually give me in any case.

I guess disappearing is what "you" want. Fine. That's what I'll do. But not entirely. You're going to be able to see everytime I'm out with someone being happy with someone and making them happy. And while you're on this grand search to find what it is you already had, I'll be barely there. And then you'll look for me. You'll realize that you're looking for what you already had. But then I'll be gone. Suit yourself. This life is too short to walk away from things that mean something. And life is definitely too short to screw something up that you claim to want so much. But since "you" can so easily ignore me (I guess that "maturity" was a facade, because "you" ignored me once again), I'll disappear. Me and all those things that were so perfect for you will vanish. My mind, my voice, my everything. Since that's what you seem to want. And I've always given "you" what you wanted.

I think there are several thoughts that have been running through my head on a fairly regular loop today. They include the words "I miss". They include the words "Hmmm...." Most of all, though, they include the words, "Don't you dare..." That sentence has ended a lot of ways in my head today. "Don't you dare think that." "Don't you dare confuse me again." And most importantly, "Don't you dare get your hopes up again because you may very well end up back where you started." And I don't want to end up there again. So don't let me get my hopes up. I miss a lot. And I want a lot. Another thought I'll have, as I curl up in my bed (you know, that bed that calls for me amongst other things) The thought I'll have is 'I wish, I wish... I think you know what I wish.' Well, that thought... And the dream I had last night. Hopefully I'll have it again.
Today's thought... Me too.
I had this dream last night. This amazing dream. Full of rainbows and "mexico" And all that. And lots of other good things. I didn't want to wake up.
Guess what? I'm a muchly smiley girl.
There are six and a half hours (or so) to wait. Have I mentioned how much I hate waiting... even when it's something/someone worth waiting for. I am impatience personified. *smile*
Have I mentioned just how much you make me smile? Because if I haven't... you should know that you do. A lot. *smile*
Remember those who have fallen...
OOOOOOOOOOOOOH... Guess what? Only 4 days left. HOORAY!! *smiley chiquita*
Guess what? I'm sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo proud of you! And guess what else? I'm sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo happy for you! But guess what else ? I knew I'd be saying that! wahahahahahahaha
I think honesty is something I value more than almost anything on this earth... The fact that you were honest? That puts you at the top of that list. Thank you ... 6 days... *wink*
I worry a lot about this... because of everything that's happened... but more because I care so much about this. about you
urlLink Graduation Day Go here to see my favorite graduation present. (I hope I get to keep it).

So my allotted dream time was definitely cut short last night... because I couldn't fall asleep. I was worried... that you wouldn't want to come still. That you wouldn't mean what you said. I much prefer talking to you until 11:30 and then dragging myself to bed with a smile on my face. I want you here. And I trust that you meant what you said... Is it next week yet? Can we just skip to that?

I'm hanging on to the last shred of hope that I've got in me... And I'm telling myself that the way things were couldn't have been an illusion, and that they couldn't have been just there out of convenience. And I'm telling myself over and over again... reminding myself actually, about the letter I received on graduation and about everything that's been said the past few days. I'm reminding myself and telling myself that those things meant something. And I'm telling myself you probably didn't get the message... or you needed some time to process some things. Or something. You mean more to me than anyone has in a long time, or I wouldn't have stuck around. You know that. I think you figured that out the night before graduation... just how much you meant to me. I thought I meant the same to you... and I'm telling myself over and over that I do. And that this is something that will be figured out and settled and all that. I think of bowling and of everything else that happened that night and the next one... and I think of the night before and the very early morning of our graduation. I know that meant something. I know you wouldn't have written that letter if you didn't mean it. I want you to come here next week. But only if I'm the only one. At this point I feel entitled to ask for that....
GOOD LUCK TODAY G!!!!
I've been having many smiley dreams lately... Perhaps I should say thank you... :)
There's a place I would much rather be... Sleeping. In PA. *grin* Make room... *wink*
I am now a college graduate... Onwards and upwards...
And who says you don't get what you want? :)

You know that feeling you get when you're with someone and you know you want to say something... but you can't because it'll shatter this facade you've worked out, silently, between the two of you? And you know that feeling you get when you're with someone and you get the unmistakable feeling that they would really rather be anywhere else... and that they're just sitting next to you due to a combination of boredom/concern that you may just lose your mind if they weren't sitting there? I hate those feelings. I hate so much of this.

I'm really not sure how to do this. And I can't very well ask you, can I? "How do you pretend nothing ever happened?" "How do you pretend you never heard me crying?" "How do you pretend that you never hurt me?" Because you wouldn't like those questions. And I'm sure I wouldn't like the answers. Here I go... falling back into that familiar role... I don't want to be that...

The 16th of June by Me It came to an end That fate-filled day. Now I can't chase The storm away. I remember the rain How it fell in a sheet. I remember how it sounded, A steady, deadly beat. I remember the thunder, How it crashed and boomed. It rumbled aloud As the clouds loomed. I remember the movie, How I sat and laughed. Nothing was more important, Than our friendly craft. I remember the phone call, When she asked me to come home. When I begged to stay, And left her alone. I remember I was early, Arrived at 4:28. I was going to gloat, That I wasn't late. I remember her form, Slumped on the couch. How she was half on the floor, Half in a slouch. I remember the sirens Screaming toward the house. I covered my ears, Meak as a mouse. I remember the lights, Flashing on the wall. Then I realized, It was all my fault. I remember it all, Hope it all goes away soon. 1993, The 16th of June.

You know something? This all started a year ago. A little more than a year ago. This little dance... back and forth and back and forth we went, knowing we wanted each other and each alternately too scared or angry or hurt to just do what we wanted... get what we wanted (each other). It's taken us a little more than a year to finally get what we wanted. I've been thinking about that, and do you know what I've concluded? When you've fought so long and through so much to get something, you don't walk away from it after a month and a half.

so. the sick feeling is subsiding a little... i'm not sure it'll go away completely, unless this works itself out. it's so hard for me to trust people... and i did (and oddly enough still do) trust you. if that's not worth something, then nothing is. :-/

I just realized something... I'm contradicting myself. The whole, "Everything was a lie" argument vs. the whole, "No, I don't think so" is kind of getting on my nerves. I think I should clarify for myself... Not everything was a lie. Far from it. I think everything was true except the very minor detail about things being "over" with her. I believe everything else was true. I think that just confuses me, which is why I argue with it. But I believe that that was the only lie... a huge lie, but the only one nonetheless. Ask yourself if it's smart to walk away from someone who made you feel like that. Ask your friends if it's smart. Ask any of my friends. Life is too short to hang on to something that isn't making you happy. Life is too short to hang on to something that you know you don't want. And life is definitely too short to keep hurting someone you claim that you "never want to see hurt." and p.s.- life is most assuredly too short to walk away from someone who filled an email account with presents. you don't find that every day. I know that life is too short. I learned that a long time ago. How long do you think that I'll ignore my own advice? And how long can you pretend not to care? How long can you hide? I hope you're not too late.

It's shitty... Anger is my defense mechanism right now. Because if I don't get angry I'm just going to cry. Forever. (if this is true anyway) And I can't cry any more. I did that for three months. Three long months. And you didn't care about it then. So I'm not going to do it now. I want the last month to not be a lie. That's all I want. I want the words, "I never want to see you hurt," to mean something. Because right now I'm hurt. You're suppose to care about that. You said you did...

Or do you have a plausible explanation for this?

It's unreal... four days ago I was smiling and looking forward to things and actually feeling as if maybe, just maybe, this would all be ok. Now there's silence once again. And when I did something to express my concern? I heard anger and annoyance in your voice. Anger and Annoyance from someone who, four days ago said, "You have no idea how much you mean to me, how much you help me all the time, how much I want us to work, how much I want to come see you." You were right. I do have no idea. Especially not now.

I wish I was there to wrap my arms around you and hold you until you felt better. I know that'd be a long time, but I don't ever get tired of having my arms around you. I miss you. I love you. I'm here if you need me.

I can't sleep. This doesn't mean I'm not tired... it just means that my thoughts are too loud for me to go to sleep. I'm getting sick... sore throat and such. And my eyes are drooping. But the thought of getting up, going into my bedroom, and climbing into bed isn't very soothing. Everytime I close my eyes I just see everything that's going wrong right now. Or I see everything I wish was going right... or better. And that's a lot of things, zipping through my brain... Clattering around like the subway.

I have never cried quite this hard. I feel like I've been kicked in the stomach. And I can't stop shaking. Because everything that meant so much to me was just made meaningless by the person who meant so much. I guess this is what I get for trusting... for believing... for loving.
I feel completely lost. Completely . Not to mention alone. I've never felt more alone.
Here they are: urlLink My Staff!! This group has made things so much fun so far at NU, and I look forward to spending a lot more time with them, and getting to know them all. BOND THIS!!!!!
And when the person who says they love you has nothing to say to you there's only one thing to say. goodbye .

I sit here and the thoughts in my head just spin and whirl and all I do is wonder what the hell it is I'm doing. What am I fighting for? When this all started I felt like such a valued part of your life. And now I feel like an inconvenience... a second thought. And I'm sick of feeling like I'm fighting a battle that I shouldn't have to fight. I'm sick of feeling sad and like a failure and like I'm competing for something that was supposedly "mine" four months ago. I'm tired. I'm sad. And I'm sick of feeling like that doesn't matter. Like I don't matter. If you care at all ...

I think it's about time you come here so I can remind you how amazing you are. Because you are. And it's my job to remind you... I'm feeling like I'm not doing such a great job. So, back to my original thought. I think it's about time you come here so I can remind you.

"This damp air is fighting my defroster. My sighs they ring victorious & fog this tinted glass. It's clouded & so is my head. The hint of these new tears are sharp. I try to hold them back. It's useless. I am useless against them. They are beating me with ease. On the way home this car hears my confessions. I think tonight I'll take the long way..." -Dashboard Confessional

I feel like I'm slowly dying. What's really great, is the person who should care doesn't . Even though they could fix it with something as simple as a conversation or some type of acknowledgement. My heart hurts. Does that matter at all?

I'm going to stop feeling sad and alone and confused and jumbled up... I know that. I just don't know when. And that doesn't help me at all. I would kill to have someone just wrap their arms around me and hold me right now. I need that so badly... to just be absolutely certain that at least one person (the one person holding me) cares enough to do that. I'm so unsure of everything else that I need to be certain of something. Right now I'm not certain of anything . That scares the hell out of me.

Last night I had a lot of dreams... it's the first time in a very long time that I've been able to remember even small parts of what I dreamt anyway. I can remember a lot of the dreams I had last night... and most of it is stuff I don't want to remember. Most of the dreams were filled with things that were walking the line between good and bad. Dreams of all the words said... and all the things left unsaid. Dreams of all of the fears I have about "it all". So many fears. And I dreamt of that beautiful time when there was no doubt or fear or confusion or questioning. I dreamt of that... and then I woke up. At first I thought I was just dreaming about all the fears and doubts and questioning and confusion. Then I realized I'd just woken up to reality... And I went back to feeling terribly alone...

I wish that I had all the answers, or even one... just so you could feel good about something for two seconds. I feel so very helpless that I can't "fix" the things that are bothering you (although I recognize that's not my job...) I hate to see you hurting. If I could snap my fingers and make you feel good about things, I would do it in an instant. I'm here for you, and I believe in you. Maybe that's not much, but that's all I've got.

Last night I sat here, thinking about all the things that have gone wrong recently... all the stupid, really meaningless crap. I let myself feel sad and cheated and hurt and upset.... all those things I've been trying so hard to avoid. But then something happened. I got ripped back into the reality of work (via a rather obnoxious fire alarm)... and then I had to go out in the cold with some people, visit the hospital with some people. And as I sat there talking and laughing with them, I realized that just because life is sometimes really shitty... it's not completely shitty. When I look at what I have surrounding me (job, friends, family) I know that I win. I may feel like I've lost, but really I win . That makes me smile, all the way down to my heart.

So, recap of today/tonight: 6 hour train ride Got into town right on time. You'd think that would be good, right? Considering I was worried I'd be late and my ride would have to wait, I thought it was wonderful. Moving on to the next part of the night.... Wait for half an hour at dark train station. Call one of my staff members to see if he will call my ride (i don't have her number, and he's the only number i have memorized). He says he will. I wait 15 more minutes (7:45pm by then) and then call him back; there's no answer. Wait five more minutes, to make sure ride wasn't going to show up. Then proceed to walk 3 miles back to campus... In the wind, freezing cold, and carrying two bags that weigh probably 40lbs all together. Get back to campus 45 minutes later. I'm exhausted, I'm so sore, and I'm sad. Tonight I need someone to wrap their arms around me and hold me and just care about me and take care of me. That's what I need right now, to just feel like I matter. Because after tonight, I truly feel like I don't.

"Can you help me with this heart inside my chest? It ain't perfect, but you should see me use it But it only works when I make a mess When it looks like I'm about to lose it If I start to cry I may not stop Love runs dry I run off..." -Edie Carey

One more hour... that's all I have to wait. One more hour until I get to leave this place and go home. Last night was a bad night. A horrible night really. I'm done having nights like that. I can't have nights like that anymore... I've been slowly losing my mind and losing myself for a long time now. I want to be found. And you know something? I want to find myself, and not leave that to someone else anymore. It's too important a job to trust anyone else to do it.

OK... I'm not sure I have the words to describe how it felt to get email from you. (i'm aware that "you" aren't reading... but it still feels good to purge my thoughts this way). It's my own fault. I opened myself up to it. I sent email first... but I never expected to get a response. Especially not after so long. Why do you still say all the same things that make me feel something and hope for things that I cannot hope for and should not hope for. Sometimes I want to disappear. Maybe that'd be better for everyone involved.

Back from my trip... still smiling. :) Missing my Steven. Sometimes it's hard going to see him and then coming back here... it's the same when I visit all my friends. So happy when I'm there, and then I come back here. But it was such a good weekend... that's what I'm going to focus on. :)

I've been procrastinating all day... have a term paper to write that I really am not motivated to write. I'm currently watching 'Finding Forrester'. Before this it was 'When Harry Met Sally'. I find myself sitting here wishing I could have a 'When Harry Met Sally' moment... you know, one of those moments when everything finally works out and settles into the exact way it's always been meant to be. Like at the end when Harry runs to the party and Sally is just leaving and they look at each other and he tells her he loves her... and at first she's saying how he can't just do that or say that and have everything be ok. But then... well then he tells her how he loves that she's cold when it's 71 degrees out and how he loves all these ridiculous things about her. he tells her he loves that she's the last person he wants to talk to when he goes to sleep at night. then Sally says, "You know Harry that's just like you. You say these things and they make it impossible for me to hate you." And then they kiss and... live happily ever after . I guess, to make a long story short I'm sitting here wishing for a happy ending. I'm wishing for that... happily ever after. I wonder when I get that?

So the past few days I've been putting a lot of time into my sketchbook. Not that I really sketch things... I can't draw at all . But I write lyrics to my favorite songs... I'm such an obsessive lyric collector. I write my poetry there, some of my favorite ones that I've written. I also make collages... I've become really obsessive about that too. I'm not sure how good they are, but I really love them. I need more magazines though... I'm low on materials. I make photo collages too. I started one of my staff. I can't wait until I have more photos of them so I can finish it. Today I decided that... I really am a good writer. Maybe not all my stuff is outstanding, but I've seriously written some good stories and poems. I was reading through my writing site today, and all the notes I've gotten. I just realized that no matter what else may be going on in my life, that is something I can do very right. That's a good feeling.

Last night a very interesting, stunning... and somewhat scary thought came into my head: What if the past two years was more about hiding from what you really want than actually having it? I was up for a very long time thinking about that. And the more I thought about it, the more I became fairly sure that that realization was right on the money. Not that it does me any good. Hiding from what I really want was just a way of accepting a very harsh truth: I can never have it.

At some point the bull has to end. If you say you want friendship, then do it. Friendship means you don't turn your back when you've done something wrong that hurts your friend to the point of making her act a little crazy. Friendship means that you try to prove you do care so your friend knows you're sincere. Friendship means you don't jerk your friend around. I'm about fed up. I laid myself out. I apologized for being the way I've been, even though it is partially warranted. And I get no response. That's such crap. I'm sick to death of getting jerked around by people who start off saying they care. In the end it becomes clear very rapidly that it's all a lie. I hate lies.
You know, I don't know why I ever believe in anything at all anymore. Because I should know by now that it all gets shoved right back down my throat. No matter what. I give up.

So part of me thinks that I should just say something and ask what the heck is going on. But at the same time I'm really afraid to ask, because I know the answer I'm going to get. And then I'm just going to be angry and hurt and I'll just totally alienate. But if I get the answer I'm expecting then I think I have every right to be angry and hurt. *sigh*

So now I'm kind of thinking What if my father was right? After last night and how it ended I'm a little unsure of exactly what to think or believe. If I've made another mistake like all the ones before it I'm not sure I'm going to be OK with it. But it was so nice... so nice. I want to believe that there's still a chance for nice.

My brain is spinning in about seven hundred different directions. I really have no clue what the heck I think I'm doing right now. Excuse my neurosis on this. Life that is. Honestly there's been so much that's happened that has destroyed the very instinct for me to trust. So much that I can't begin to get in to, because so much of it was my own fault. I can't do that again... make those mistakes again I mean. Even though it would be very, very easy to do so. I think too much. I realize that. It's the times that I don't think that I end up with my teeth kicked in and my heart shattered on the ground. So think I shall...
"Where should I go? what should I do? I don't understand what you want from me cause I don't know if I can trust you I don't understand what you want from me..." -Nickelback

i've made so many mistakes in the past and being myself makes nothing last trusting has only ended in pain and hoping has just ended the same.
"You go to sleep dreamin' how you would Be a different kind if you thought you could But you come awake the way you are instead..." -Counting Crows
When you take off the rose colored glasses And are left faced with the reality of me You will be disappointed.

This whole situation is my fault. I knew months ago what would happen if the truth came to the surface. Ever. Now it has, and exactly what I thought would happen is happening. I'm sitting here hating myself for not being good enough (again) And instead of just hating myself I'm letting it spill on to you And you don't deserve it. I know it. I know that everything you say to me is meant in the most genuine way. I know that. I also know that when I hear it (or read it as the case may be) All I do is shake my head in disbelief, because I can no longer believe (truly) that any of it is sincere. I can't handle this. Things won't change... no. I'll just be without a friend, because I don't know how to do this right now. I'll just curl up into myself and hope that this pain goes away. I'm not holding my breath. You are better off without me.

I know I owe you more than I'm currently giving... but I don't know how to give more without losing myself completely. This is mortifying. This whole damn thing. I'm sorry I'm being this way... I just don't know how else to be right now.

"In one of these dreams, you forgive me It makes me think of the bad decisions that keep you at home How could anyone else have changed? All these wrong conclusions that leave you alone How could anyone rearrange? How could everyone else have changed? What I see... I believe For all the things I'm losing I might as well resign myself to try and make a change..." -Counting Crows
I cut out my own heart today.
I found myself hating you today for simply being you Becuase the "you" that you are can never be mine.
I honestly don't know what I'm doing.

I got an IM last night, from someone not on my buddy list. I was just on my way to pass out after a night of drunken debauchery and celebration, so I just clicked "accept message" and I went to bed, figuring it was someone I knew that just wanted to wish me a happy birthday. I kind of expected whoever it was to identify themselves. They didn't. I mean, they wished me a happy birthday, said, "I see that you're sleeping. Goodnight then." I have no clue who it was... Well that's not entirely true. I have an inkling ... But in order to believe that it was actually that person is to believe that they came out of hiding and silence long enough to wish me a happy birthday. If that's the case, that means so much to me. More than I can say. I don't want to believe that, though. In all odds it will be one of my friends who will reappear on that screenname and say, "Hey, that was me the other night. Sorry, I should've told you." And I will be extremely disappointed.
Someone please stop me from doing this to myself. This whole feeling thing just isn't working out because I'm always doing it for the wrong person. Just stop me before I mess something up.

I say some truly awful things to my friends sometimes. For example: "it's always funny to me when someone is in a relationship and has been for an extended period of time and really the majority of the relatiship is just great... it always seems funny and echoes hollow to me when they act like they have one f-ing clue when i say "yeah, I've had three and a half years of lying, cheating, emotionally abusive asshole boyfriends... and before/after that all i've had is rejection." i'm not mad at you. i'm mad at life. and i'm really sick of people who have no clue trying to empathize. because really, they don't have any idea." Yeah, I'm an awesome friend when I'm trying to protect myself and not deal with things. Really awesome.
I think what it comes down to right now is this: I just can't do this. Plain and simple.

What truly scares me right now is how much I already trust you... and I should know better than to let that happen this way. So quickly and without thought. Because doing things this way always always always lands me with my heart on the ground. Trampled and bruised and bleeding. I don't know what I should do now: fight my urge to build up the walls that will protect me or build them higher than ever before. Believe it or not the higher they go, the better off you'll be.

It would be so easy to let myself fall into this without any thought... I don't trust myself enough to do that. Every time I've trusted anyone or anything it's ended rather poorly. It would be nice, though, to be able to... What a surprising goal to have...

The 16th of June by Me It came to an end That fate-filled day. Now I can't chase The storm away. I remember the rain How it fell in a sheet. I remember how it sounded, A steady, deadly beat. I remember the thunder, How it crashed and boomed. It rumbled aloud As the clouds loomed. I remember the movie, How I sat and laughed. Nothing was more important, Than our friendly craft. I remember the phone call, When she asked me to come home. When I begged to stay, And left her alone. I remember I was early, Arrived at 4:28. I was going to gloat, That I wasn't late. I remember her form, Slumped on the couch. How she was half on the floor, Half in a slouch. I remember the sirens Screaming toward the house. I covered my ears, Meak as a mouse. I remember the lights, Flashing on the wall. Then I realized, It was all my fault. I remember it all, Hope it all goes away soon. 1993, The 16th of June.

Handed in my rough draft today; apparently I'm on the right track with it because I got 10/10 possible points. I have a big sense of relief, because my professor only asked that I add three small parts to the paper, other than the last few things that weren't due for the draft. Took a test today in this class too. It was much more difficult than any of my classmates and I thought it would be. Hopefully I did alright at that too... although I have to have faith in the fact that I'm a really good student, and also really quite smart. So I'm assuming I'll do as well on the test as I did on the paper. Mom, Dad, and Sean will be here tomorrow and will stay until Sunday. I can't wait to see them. Then I have one more week (4 days) of class. After that I prance of to Rochester and go camping with Steve. :) I'm really excited about that; we've been meaning to go for the last two years (i think), ever since we first went and had such a good time. It will only be for two nights, but it should be fun. Then from the campsite I'll go to Shane's, and then from there to my house and soon after to his parents' house. Busy weekend and week ahead... but I can't wait until next weekend. Especially for the time when I see Shane.

I know that I've got him. And that makes everything else just fade away. :) Thank you for the talk last night Shane, and for being so understanding about everything. Mainly? Thank you for just being you. You're a truly wonderful and amazing person... and I'm so glad you're in my life.

It was a simply glorious weekend. Friday was a relatively low-key day... Shane and I just went out for lunch and then rented a movie and made dinner that night. Saturday I went to Caz and spent the afternoon hanging out with Monica and Becky; it was nice seeing both of them. I also got to see Mrs. Egan... that was truly fabulous. I miss her a lot now that I'm not living in Caz anymore. I also miss Max and Ella (her dogs that I walked for two years). Max isn't doing so well with his arthritis and it doesn't appear as if he'll be with us for much longer. I'm really glad I had the opportunity to see them. Sunday was the big day... Shane's 26th Birthday! We woke up fairly early and got ready to go to the Renaissance Faire. Before we left he opened his presents. I got him the baby turtle from 'Finding Nemo' because he seemed to really enjoy that part of the movie (and he likes turtles)... and I thought it was really cute. I also gave him a scrapbook that I've been working on since May. He had suggested that we start one together, and I thought it would be nice for each of us to have one. So I made him one, and myself one. He liked it a lot. He gets one of his presents today because it just got here in the mail... so I won't post what it is until he's here and has it! The Ren. Faire was such a great time. We were there all day. He bought me a really pretty dress to wear; it was purple with a really pretty Celtic knot embroidered on the front. He also made me a belt to wear. So we walked around in costume all day. :) His boss used me as his audience volunteer during his show, and I got a free Pucking Rat (this requires a lot of explanation!). Another lady that Shane knows was so nice... she gave me a beautiful bead embroidered bag simply because I told her it was beautiful. It has a buttefly in bead work on it. We went to see Brian's mud show, and then we went to watch the jousting horses. That was fabulous. After that we spent much of the afternoon looking around for his friend Jamie and Jamie's girlfriend Carrie. We finally found them just as they were leaving, but they decided to hang around. It was great to see Jamie again, and I'm really glad I finally got to meet Carrie. Fun times all around. That night we got home at around 8pm. Shane decided to take a "quick nap" and told me to wake him at 9pm. The quick nap turned into quite a long nap; I tried to wake him up until around 11, and then I finally gave up and went to sleep myself :). Yesterday was just a really fun day. Brian was having a margurita party and the house of one of the people who works at the Ren Faire with him. We all got there at noon. I'm not sure exactly how much tequilla Brian puts in his marguritas, but I was pretty well intoxicated by 4pm. Needless to say, I couldn't drive home as I'd planned to, so we just drank some more. We were there until about 12:30am, and then went back to the apartment and passed out. It was a really fun night; I got to meet a lot more people from the Faire, and I got to see a lot of people that I'd met the last time I was in Oswego. Plus, I got one extra night there with Shane so that was quite wonderful. He will be here sometime this afternoon/evening. He's going to spend the week job hunting and handing out resumes around the area. It will be quite nice to have him here. Then he'll go home for the weekend to work at the Ren. Faire. This weekend was truly fantastic. I can't even fully describe how amazing this man is... how good he treats me, and how good he makes me feel. Simply lovely. Thank you baby, for making your birthday weekend an amazing time for me. I hope you had an even better time than I did. :)

Currently at Shane's. He's at work for the day, so I'm taking advantage of his absence and baking his birthday cake. :) After it's done I'm taking a quick jaunt down to Caz to visit with friends for the afternoon. Then I'll come back here in time to meet him when he's done. Then I will banish him to his room while I decorate the cake and hide it over night. Tomorrow will be a busy and fun day. We'll spend most of the day at the Ren Faire with each other and some of his friends that I've met. I'm looking forward to seeing them again. Oh yes, and he will get his presents. :) I'm off to check the cake and finish doing some cleaning up. Kelsie- I will post what all the top secret stuff is as soon as he's opened it!

Exhausting week that finally ends tomorrow... and then Friday I go to Oswego to be with Shane. *smile* Class is going well, although my professor is slightly loopy. She's got more personality that I can possibly describe... and she goes off on these amazing tangential thought trips. Heehee. It makes the 5 hours of class go by pretty quick. As of tomorrow class is half over; hooray for 2 week long summer courses that give you three graduate credit hours toward your CAS. Tomorrow the first batch of freshmen come in for CARE. It's kind of a mini orientation session for the kids and their parents to learn about financial aid, and to take tests, and also have the experience of sleeping over on campus. We've been preparing for it since May. CARE session II comes in on Monday while I'm in Oswego, and they leave Tuesday. Then on Wednesday CARE session III is here. That should be an interesting few days, because Shane will be here with me starting on Monday (on the hunt for a job!) and I will be frantically making up beds for that last session. Then Camp College is here the 22nd through the 24th. More beds to make for that. It will be good to have him here though... I love coming home to him. :) All of the top secret birthday stuff is done... wrapped up and ready to go. I went on an adventure Sunday to find the cake Shane wanted! Took me four different stores, but it's found thank goodness. I can't wait to get there Friday afternoon. Then Saturday he decided he wanted to work so he could buy me a present on Sunday. Silly boy. (but oh so lovely). I'll be going to Caz to visit Monica for the afternoon, so that will be really nice. Then Saturday night I will probably do some baking for Sunday's birthday celebration. So it's off to bed. To dream of lovely things. :)

Happiness with you is neverending. 5 more days, maybe 4 if I can escape the freshmen invasion *wink* I miss you. "All I really wanna say is you're the reason I wanna stay I loved you before I met you and I met you just in time 'cause there was nothing left... ...you have made me smile again in fact, I might be sore from it it's been a while." -Ben Folds Five *perhaps the biggest jump in lyrics ever. those are the ones that remind me of you though.

On the agenda this weekend: -much relaxing -top secret boyfriend birthday preparation (6 days Shane!) -clean the car -start rebuilding my poetry and prose site -more webpage updating After this weekend life gets kind of hectic. I will be working in the office every day from 8:30am-11am. Then I will go to class at 11 until 4pm. Then it will be off to the gym until about 5pm. After that I will come back here and make beds in preparation for the freshmen coming in for the first CARE session on Thursday night. Then on Friday I get to go to Oswego to spend yet another glorious weekend with Shane; it's his birthday. :) This weekend is the first full weekend we haven't seen each other since May. Thank goodness for phone calls and IMs and the like. Luckily next weekend will be spent there helping him celebrate his birthday in style. I have many tricks up my sleeves *wink* Then after the wonderful weekend, I have another week just like this one full of classes, work, and making beds for freshmen coming in for orientation. Things kind of settle down after that; I'll only have one more class to finish up in the last week of July/first week in August. And then? Shane and I go to my house for almost a whole week to relax in have fun. A brief note: Thank you Kelsie and MyTwin for everything. And now it's off to do some more computer work, before moving on to top secret birthday things. Heehee. I think I'm more excited about his birthday than Shane is. :) Maybe after all that stuff I will play my guitar. Busy times, relaxing :)

More anonymous notes from more immature and ignorant people. I'd respond very thoroughly and directly to the most recent one and what it pertains to, but I respect my boyfriend far too much for that. Again, if you have something to say to me, leave your name. My email address is listed on most of my sites. My AIM name is too. It's clear, though, that I am dealing with (and in effect we, meaning Shane and I) are dealing with highly immature, vindictive, and spiteful people that have nothing better to do with their time than to hide behind anonymity in order to lash out. I remember reacting like that in high school. Thankfully, most people grow up after high school and college and know how to behave like adults. Obviously that's not always the case, as is evident by this ridiculous childishness. **thank you, Shane, for the note you left in response to the ridiculousness. "And I know that I am I am I am the luckiest." -Ben Folds
Sometimes I feel invisible. *note: this is an incomplete thought. it will remain that way, because the rest isn't very nice.
Can't sleep.

I love the "mature" people of this world that have nothing better to do with their lives than leave cruel, annonymous notes on someone else's site. Honestly, that's amazingly witty and intelligent... not to mention quite mature. A few guesses as to who it could be. All of them are pathetic excuses for human beings. My advice? Get over yourself and grow up. Or grow a set and leave your name. And that's all I have to say on that matter.

Currently at Shane's house :) I haven't had internet access in my room at school for several days, so I thought I'd toss up a quick post while I was here. He is lovely and wonderful. I smile so frequently when I'm with him. We went to see Ben Folds, Rufus Wainwright and Guster on Saturday. Amazing. Lovely to be there with him, especially during Ben Folds, because he likes him so much. Happy, happy girl. :)

The good word: -got an A on my final paper -got an A on my final exam -I am done with this class! -I am leaving for camping as soon as Shane calls me back :) -Two(ish) more days until I'm with him^ (not counting today or Sunday!)

It's today!!!!!!! Only two and a half hours of work... and then 5 hours of class (bah to class)... and then a 2 and a half hour drive... Before I go camping!!!! :) And then it's only Friday and Saturday... Before I go see Shane and we go to my house and to Vt. and then back to my house and do many fun things! I can't wait to see you baby!

Financial Aid crisis: Apparently averted (or so they say). Cross your fingers, as they don't seem to know what they're doing. 3 more days until I see my Shane :) And then it's off for the week of road trips. I can't wait... we have a really fun week planned. I'm excited to meet his parents, and excited to have him home with me to spend time with my family and meet my closest friends. They're all psyched to meet him too; anyone who rates this high in my books is a point of interest for my buddies *wink* Now it's off to pack up some things to move to my new apartment on campus... and for my camping trip. Woohoo.

I hate the financial aid office. I called them today to check in and see if they'd gotten the certification paperwork from my loan people. They said they hadn't, so I called the lenders. They told me that the school could access the information on line. So I called financial aid back and they told me that I was inelligible for this loan too! This is after they told me a month ago that all I'd have to do is apply for a personal education loan that would cover the cost of my classes. So the lady told me that I needed to come up with more expenses... that a computer would do it. I'm not sure yet if there's a limit on how much I can spend on the computer or if there's a certain amount I have to spend in order to get the school to certify the loan. Shane found me a computer on line and got the price up to a place where it should definitely get them to certify the loan. I'm also going to go on line and find two more options, one significantly less expensive, and one somewhere in the middle. That way it'll cover all the possibilities she could come up with. Hopefully one of them will be sufficient for her to certify the loan; if the school wants their money then they need to certify it. Otherwise I have no way of paying them. But the bright side? Shane. :) He was right there when I needed him today, and was so helpful in finding a computer that was expensive enough to warrant the loan. He was also quite wonderful last night with 2 fabulous phone calls... especially the second one :) Thank you Shane, for being there and helping so much. Knowing you're there helps so much. I

"Every time I look at you the world just melts away All my troubles all my fears dissolve in your affections You've seen me at my weakest but you take me as I am And when I fall you offer me a softer place to land You stay the course you hold the line you keep it all together You're the one true thing I know I can believe in You're all the things that I desire you save me you complete me You're the one true thing I know I can believe." -Sarah McLachlan

It's been a great weekend so far. Busy. But really a lot of fun. It's been wonderful having my parents here. Today I think we're going back to Canada for a little while before they all go home. I'll miss them... but at the same time the peace and quiet will be nice. My room looks like a bomb hit it! I talked to Steve the other night; he's still hunting for someplace to camp. Hopefully he'll find something, otherwise we'll just be hanging out at his house. I don't really mind doing that, but I've been looking forward to doing some camping. One more week until I go to Oswego and then Shane and I go home. :) I can't wait to see him, or to spend that week together. I'm really looking forward to going to Vermont and meeting his parents and anyone else that we happen to meet up with. I'm also looking forward to all the things we have planned while we're at my house. My parents are excited to see him again; they like him a lot. So do I :).
